16905540883685093.text: Can I book a "Business" class ticket for flights lasting less than 10 hours?
16905540883685093.node_text: Booking a "Business"  class ticket is allowed on flights which last more than 10 uninterrupted hours. Otherwise, only the cheapest flight class is reimbursable. A seat reservation is not reimbursable.

16905665308995557.text: How should I plan my business trip if I'm traveling alone?
16905665308995557.node_text: Your business trip must be planned as though you were traveling alone (without your family). How doe that work? Provide receipts for only the costs associated with purchases for yourself Collect comparison offers where necessary (e.g., transportation costs and accommodation) for what the costs would have been for only one person Personal expenses must be strictly separated from business expensesYou are responsible for paying all additional costs that result from bringing your family along.

16905709707150207.node_text: For all  business trips (even for short trips or ones lasting only a single day) outside the country to EU-countries, Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein or Switzerland, you will need to fill out an A1 Form , which must be brought with you when you leave the country. 16905752781974812.text: How much do you get per person for transporting coworkers?
16905752781974812.node_text: If you are also transporting other coworkers, you are entitled to 2 Cent per person und kilometer, for each passenger who is also eligible for travel reimbursement. (To claim a passenger, they must also sign your travel reimbursement request.) If you are transporting business related items (e.g., files) weighing more than 50 Kg you are eligible for 2 Cent per 50 Kg and Kilometer. (Changes coming in 2022)
